snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria extended his perfect start to 2012 by winning a World Cup slalom in Adelboden, Switzerland.
abstract: Austria's Marcel Hirscher extends his perfect start to 2012 by winning a World Cup slalom in Adelboden, Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria extended his perfect start to 2012 by winning a World Cup slalom in Adelboden, Switzerland.

headline.main: Austrian Remains Perfect in Men’s Slalom
headline.print_headline: Austrian Remains Perfect in Men’s Slalom
